sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 编辑弹框 -->
      <a-modal
      title="编辑"
      style="top: 20px;"
      :width="600"
      v-model="visible"
      @ok="handleSubmit"
    >
    <a-form :form="form">
      <a-form-item
        label="机器人名称"
        :labelCol="labelCol"
        :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-input
          placeholder="机器人名称" 
          v-decorator="[
            'name',
            {
              rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入机器人名称' }],
              initialValue: editData.name,
            }]"
          />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item
        label="所属单位"
        :labelCol="labelCol"
        :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-select 
          showSearch
          placeholder="选择所属单位"
          optionFilterProp="children"
          :filterOption="filterOption"
          v-decorator="[
            'orgId',
            {rules: [{ required: true, message: '请选择' }],
            initialValue: editData.orgName}
          ]"
        >
          <a-select-option v-for="(item ,key) in orgNames" :key="key" :value="item.id">
            {{item.name}}
          </a-select-option>
         
        </a-select>
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item
        label="有效截止时间"
        :labelCol="labelCol"
        :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-date-picker showTime  @change="onChange"  format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"
        v-decorator="[
          'validity',
          {rules:[{required:true,message:'请选择时间'}],
            initialValue:moment(editData.validityDate, dateFormat)
          }
        ]" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item
        label="人脸失效时间(小时)"
        :labelCol="labelCol"
        :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-input
          v-decorator="[
            'faceTime',
            {rules: [{ message: '请输入人脸失效时间' }],
            initialValue: editData.faceTime}
          ]"
          placeholder="人脸失效时间"
           />
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { editRobot , getOrgLists} from '@/api/robot';
import moment from 'moment';
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      labelCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 7 }
      },
      wrapperCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 13 }
      },
      visible: false,
      confirmLoading: false,
      dateFormat: 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss',
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
      orgNames:[],
      editData:{},
      validityDate:''
    }
  },
  created(){
    this.handleOrgLists();
  },
  methods: {
    moment,
    // 获取该用户下的所属单位
    handleOrgLists(){
      var _this = this;
      var id = localStorage.getItem('userId');
      var param = { userId : id }
      getOrgLists(param).then(res => {
        _this.orgNames = res.result;
        if(res.code !== 0){
          _this.$message.error(res.message)
        }
          
      }).catch( (err) => console.log(err))
    },
    add (record) {
      this.visible = true;
      this.validityDate = record.validityDate;
      this.editData = record;
    },
    handleSubmit () {
      const { form: { validateFields } } = this
      this.confirmLoading = true
      validateFields((errors, values) => {
        values.validity = this.validityDate;
        if (!errors) {
          var param = Object.assign(values,{entityId:this.editData.id} )
          var _this = this;
          setTimeout(() => {
            editRobot(param).then(res => {
              if(res.code == 0){
                _this.$message.success('修改成功');
                // 重置输入框内容
                _this.form.resetFields();
                
              } else {
                _this.$message.error(res.message)
              }
            });
            this.visible = false
            
            this.confirmLoading = false
            this.$emit('ok', values)
          }, 300)
        } else {
          this.confirmLoading = false
        }
      })
    },
    handleCancel () {
      this.visible = false;
      this.editData = {}
    },
    filterOption(input, option) {
      return option.componentOptions.children[0].text.toLowerCase().indexOf(input.toLowerCase()) >= 0
    },
    onChange(date, dateString) {
      this.validityDate = dateString;
      console.log(date, dateString);
    },
  }
}
</script>
